We continue our progress from last week, cleaning and combining datasets from the survey collected in 2016 and 2018 in order to compare mental health attitudes and prevalence in tech across these two survey years. We combed through changes in the survey structure and questions, keeping a record [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xbB0idnWkND3aZt5K1VwNHK_7ivlMMTf). From this, we note some questions are omitted or reworded from the two survey years.
